page.title: 06HINTON WALDRIST FETE.
page.content: Every year a fete is held in Hinton Waldrist.It is held in aid of their church.This year the money raised is going to the church restoration fund. There were games,sideshows and displays eg.bowling, aunt sally, aiming games, quzzes, a bookstall, a raffle, a silent auction, a judo display and a country dang display.There would have been pony des but the pony started playing up so they were called off.Longworth school provided the dancing.There were about 30f us that danced.The dances we did were Lucky 7,Durham reel,Virginia reel and I want to be near you.There were also refreshments and all of the dancers took advantage of the icecreams after the display as it was a hot and sunny day.The fete this year raised 1042 pounds.
